row.process:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
! Validating Input :SET &COUNT# = 0 :IF &UC4RB_JSN_JSON_FILE# EQ "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_JSN_JSON# EQ "" : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDIF :IF &COUNT# NE 1 : STOP MSG, 50, "Please provide either Json file path or content." :ENDIF
!------------------------------------------ Building java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "DeleteDataAction"
! Build java arguments : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_JSN_PATH_JAR#"' : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! json : IF &UC4RB_JSN_JSON_FILE# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JSN_JSON_FILE# : ELSE : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.WRITE_JSON_TO_FILE : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TEMP_FILE_PATH# : ENDIF
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#, " -json &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! path : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JSN_JSON_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#, " -path &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Action fail or not : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#, " -fail &UC4RB_JSN_ACTION_FAIL#")
! Modified download file path : IF &UC4RB_JSN_DWNLD_PATH# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JSN_DWNLD_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_JSN_CMD# , " -downloadPath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
: PRINT &UC4RB_JSN_CMD#
&UC4RB_JSN_CMD#
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** REMOVE JSON CONTENT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** REMOVE JSON CONTENT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JSON.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS@UNIX : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
